alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 8:11PM MDT until August 10 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE JACOB CITY BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR EASTERN TOOELE COUNTY... At 811 PM MDT, Tooele County Emergency Management reported a debris flow crossed the Soldier Canyon county road near the Stockton Water Treatment facility from earlier rainfall. Clean up of a few feet of debris on the road is in progress. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Jacob City Burn Scar. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Jacob City Burn Scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... The Soldier Canyon county road FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Move away from recently burned areas. Life-threatening flooding of creeks, roads and normally dry washes is likely. The heavy rains will likely trigger rockslides, mudslides and debris flows in steep terrain, especially in and around these areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
